name: African Elephant
habitat: Savannas, forests, deserts, and marshes across Africa
description: The African elephant is the largest land animal on Earth. It is known for its large ears that help regulate body temperature.

name: Tiger
habitat: Tropical forests, grasslands, and mangroves across Asia
description: Tigers are the largest of the big cats, known for their striking orange coat with black stripes.

name: Blue Whale
description: The blue whale is the largest animal ever known to have existed. It feeds primarily on tiny krill and can reach up to 100 feet in length.

name: Koala
description: Koalas are marsupials known for their tree-dwelling lifestyle and diet of eucalyptus leaves.

name: Snow Leopard
habitat: Mountain ranges of Central and South Asia
description: Snow leopards are elusive big cats adapted to cold mountain environments, with thick fur and long tails.
